title: Escrow
description: Create shareable escrow links for trustless payments. Lock SOL with timelock protection, release on delivery, or dispute for oracle arbitration.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Create an escrow with provider address, amount, and timelock period.
howItWorks.step2: Share the escrow URL. Anyone can execute the transaction via X or compatible wallets.
howItWorks.step3: Release funds after delivery, or file a dispute for oracle arbitration.
howItWorks.step4: Disputes are resolved by Switchboard oracles within 24-48 hours.
